# Science Department SOP These are the list of SOPs that Science Personnel should follow. These are, as stated before, [bold]not checklists[/bold] and should be treated as guidelines.
For clarification, Roboticist can extend to any Science personnel working on Robots.
It is expected that [color=#cc74fc]Research Assistant[/color] and [color=#cc74fc]Scientist[/color] coincide in the same SOP guidelines.
The following jobs have entries in this Department, the [color=#1b67a5][bold]Research Director[/bold][/color] being the Head of Staff: - [textlink="Research Director" link="ResearchDirector SOP"] - [textlink="Roboticist" link="Roboticist SOP"] - [textlink="Scientist" link="Scientist SOP"] - [textlink="Research Assistant" link="Scientist SOP"]
